column4: BTW. Here's a suggestion for Ubuntu. When you're tyring to play media, and it says you don't have the proper codecs installed, it would be nice if Ubuntu would bring up a list of codecs you can download so that you can play the file you want to play.
there are legal reasons that the codecs are not installed.  See easyubuntu for a way to easily install the codecs
mp3 is a given legal problem
